main event: A civilian woman observed a bright light in the sky which moved slowly to the east and disappeared after about 5-10 minutes.
interesting points: The light was stationary for a period before moving,The sighting occurred in Dayton, Ohio on February 9, 1953,This light was concluded to be probably Venus,A crude sketch of the object was included but there were no photographs,The woman attempted to get her husband to corroborate the sighting but the object had already vanished.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
